description: When the nexthop of policy based routing apply clause became
unreachable according to routing information, trap is generated
and is sent to the remote monitoring device.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PBR-MIB::h3cPBRNexthopFailedTrap H3C-PBR-MIB::h3cPBRNexthopAddrType i 0 H3C-PBR-MIB::h3cPBRNexthopAddr s EXAMPLE

description: Indicating address type of h3cPBRNexthopAddr, which can be either IPv4
variables.name: H3C-PBR-MIB::h3cPBRNexthopAddrType

description: The involved nexthop IP address of trap information.
variables.name: H3C-PBR-MIB::h3cPBRNexthopAddr
